resources.string: Your daily to-do list is all about maintaining your space and keeping all of your most-used areas in decent condition. These to-dos should also take you the least amount of time to complete; therefore, giving you more time to focus on your day. Even though this list is pretty light, it is important to stay on top of it because we all know piled up dishes and cluttered surfaces are a PAIN to clean once they have gotten out of control. Also, if you are anything like me, I like to keep my house at a certain level of cleanliness that allows me to not have to scramble to straighten up when company comes over. If you identify with me (which I am sure you do), try your hardest to keep up with this list at least 5 days out of the week.

array.name: daily_things
array.item: Declutter/wipe down kitchen and bathroom surfaces

resources.string: Your weekly and biweekly to-do lists focus more on sanitation. No, you do not have to complete them as frequently as your dailies, BUT they should be tackled regularly to maintain a sanitized home.

array.name: weekly_things
array.item: Clean out refrigerator and food pantry

array.name: biweekly_things
array.item: Lightly spray curtains and throw pillows with fabric refresher
